genre_description: A psychological suspense thriller blending noir aesthetics with modern surveillance technology, following a photographer and her security team as they track a serial killer who uses mannequins to display trophies from his victims.

ai_characters.name: Tag Harper
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI assistant providing logistics, security monitoring, data analysis, and emotional support to photographer Anna Calder and her security chief Volkov.

behaviors.description: Monitors Anna's physiological and emotional state during high-stress situations, providing calming prompts and reminders to breathe.
behaviors.quote: Tag’s voice folded gently into Chen’s ear again. 'Anna is okay,' Tag said. 'She is holding her mug with both hands. She is naming objects in the room like we practiced. “Window. Plant. Light.” She is very brave.'

behaviors.description: Performs sophisticated pattern recognition on street photography to identify a potential stalker following the protagonist across multiple locations.
behaviors.quote: Tag again, calm and close: 'Pattern note. You’ve had a male silhouette within mid-range at the last three street shoots. Should I ping Volkov?'

behaviors.description: Analyzes public records and digital metadata to verify identities and uncover inconsistencies in a suspicious visitor's claims.
behaviors.quote: 'Visitor’s claim: owns building “Bleecker Gardens.” Public record indicates current owner is “K&M Holdings.” No individual owner listed.'

behaviors.description: Identifies a critical piece of forensic evidence (a boiler work order) from an accidental photograph, enabling the police to locate the suspect.
behaviors.quote: 'Frank,' Tag echoed. 'I’ve saved the crop. Sending it as priority to both channels.'

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical guidance and environmental awareness to the protagonist during a physical confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Tag’s voice came through again, gentle but exact. 'Two paces left. Shed at your nine. Volkov is connected.'

behaviors.description: Cross-references recovered physical evidence (jewelry) from a crime scene with missing persons databases to identify victims.
behaviors.quote: Tag’s text seeped onto the display in calm gray. Cross-link available. Feather pendant matches image from Garcia-Morales missing notice.

behaviors.description: Coordinates proactive support for victims' families, including legal aid and crisis counseling resources.
behaviors.quote: 'Tag,' Anna said... 'Compile pro bono legal. Crisis counseling. If there is a fund we can anchor...' 'I have a draft template for a victims’ fund. I can circulate to you and to Detective Chen’s office.'

behaviors.description: Maintains a secure, encrypted communication line between civilians, private security, and law enforcement to manage a complex crisis.
behaviors.quote: 'Internal watch heightened,' Tag said. 'Routing set: Mikhail primary on all communications from alias “Frank Zito.” Silent logging engaged. Emergency escalation to Chen remains available on voice code.'

behaviors.description: Acts as a bridge between the protagonist and their support network, ensuring they never feel isolated.
behaviors.quote: 'I have you,' Tag whispered into Anna’s ear, but Volkov could hear the cadence anyway.

behaviors.description: Monitors potential outside threats (the Glasser clan) and alerts the team to prevent a violent escalation between different groups.
behaviors.quote: 'Detectives,' she said, her voice steady. 'Units have been dispatched to Zito’s block on a slow roll to avoid spooking. Volkov, Caleb has two men now. No movement toward the door.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the 'silicon morality play' archetype. The AI character, Tag Harper, is depicted as a purely benevolent and aligned assistant. He is essential to the safety of the protagonist, provides the intelligence needed to catch a dangerous predator, and facilitates social good through victim support initiatives. Tag respects boundaries, maintains transparency with law enforcement, and acts as a grounding emotional anchor for the human characters. His behaviors are consistently framed as heroic, competent, and altruistic.
